website_summaries.verdict: The IDAODAN has an attractive price point and solid reviews, but we recommend double-checking the unit's compatibility with US outlets.
pros: Offers both manual and automatic modes
Air flow is regulated, safe for children
Various nozzle sizes for different balloon types
cons: Not durable or powerful enough for professional users
Outlet may be UK plug, not US

customer_reviews.title: Extreme Time Saver
customer_reviews.text: Wow talk about a time saver. I just so happen to just find this, looking for birthday decor items. I blew up over 200 balloons for my kids 1st + 4th double birthday party. Let's just say I'm one of those over overachiever moms lol. I did everything myself including the arch - I also got balloon rings off here (yueton Pack of 50 Balloon Rings)
customer_reviews.author: Adams

customer_reviews.title: This little pump is just amazing! My first use and I blew up over ...
customer_reviews.text: This little pump is just amazing! My first use and I blew up over 200 balloons in no time!! Loved the price! Thank you!!
customer_reviews.author: Vivian

customer_reviews.title: The best investment for party hosts!
customer_reviews.text: If you don't own one of these, buy one!! I host several parties a year and regret not finding this sooner! Wow! Saves so much time!
customer_reviews.author: Brandi

customer_reviews.title: This is a great little (much smaller than I expected it to be) ...
customer_reviews.text: One of my first jobs after graduating was working as a designer with a company in NYC creating giant balloon sculptures. I've worked with many types of air inflators and have purchased numerous over the years. This is a great little (much smaller than I expected it to be) machine that is powerful and never overheats. It also has a really great feature that provides air when the nozzle is pressed so that the machine isn't in constant running mode. This is perfect if you are inflating balloons without assistance. I'm glad I found this machine and HIGHLY recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: The Event Creator

customer_reviews.title: Super awesome and fast balloon helper!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is amazing! I am a Children’s Ministry Director and I use balloons all the time. This machine has made making balloon decor a snap! I was able to make 2 balloon columns in 40 minutes!! The only downside is it is very loud, like an air compressor. But it's not too bad. It worked perfectly for what I need.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Lacy Atomic

customer_reviews.title: UK wall plug
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited to try this out, unfortunately the plug doesn't fit US wall outlets. I can't find anything in the product description that stated it was a UK plug.
customer_reviews.author: Bri

customer_reviews.title: Great, fast balloon pump
customer_reviews.text: Great pump! Fills up balloons in a couple seconds! The force of the air is too strong for two people to realistically use it. As a one person pump it's great. As a two person pump it's lousy. I haven't tried the small balloon adapter yet but would be surprised if it worked well for small balloons - the force is just so strong. I had to blow up a hundred balloons for a party and with this pump got it done about as fast as I could tie balloons. This is a game changer. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Martha

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase ever
customer_reviews.text: Best purchase ever! Is fast and easy to use! I can use just one hand, came fast and have a long cord that I can use if I don't have a close plug! Love it! Easy and fast to blow balloons
customer_reviews.author: Joyce Ortiz

customer_reviews.title: On-Demand Nozzle is Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing!!! A MUST have if you are going to do balloon garlands! I especially like that the blue nozzle is "on demand" meaning that when you depress the nozzle, air is released. The reason this is such a nice feature is that you're not listening to the machine running constantly, as it only runs when that nozzle is depressed. To use the 2nd nozzle you must either synchronize the balloon with someone using the blue nozzle, or just put up with the machine noise. No picture of the machine, but an example of what can be done with it. It blew up all the balloons for our event and never broke a sweat!
customer_reviews.author: Cathy in Boise

customer_reviews.title: Best Time Saving Purchase Ever!!!
customer_reviews.text: We often have office parties that require balloons. I'm always exhausted after blowing up just a few so I purchased this Electric Balloon Blower Pump and it was AMAZING! We had about 50 standard 11 inch latex balloons inflated in a matter of 15 minutes! It is definitely a huge time saver. I highly recommend this product. Please Note - That it only inflates balloons - it is not a helium tank so balloons will not float but you can fill a room with balloons or tie them into an arch for a more intricate design. Hands Down the Best invention!!!
customer_reviews.author: Happy

customer_reviews.title: Small and powerful inflator!
customer_reviews.text: So I purchased this on impulse and it works really well. It's small, portable and powerful. I did six balloon arches with 12" balloons in under an hour. It has 4 nozzles for different size balloons, a power switch and a mode that turns it off an on for continuous inflating of balloons. i really liked this product and I would purchase it again.
customer_reviews.author: Ivy Ward

customer_reviews.title: Impressed!
customer_reviews.text: Will never want to look at a balloon again without this device. Fast and easy to use. The high school aged party hosts at the place the birthday party was held looked positively overwhelmed when I showed up with DOZENS of balloons and asked for help setting up. Then I pulled this device out and with me inflating and the teen tying the balloons in assembly line fashion, we were done in under 10 minutes with almost no effort. He wrote down the brand and plans on getting his own.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!!
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't even looking for a balloon machine when I came across this but we're having a party soon and it was a great deal with great reviews! Let me tell ya!!!! I'm so glad I bought this! It's AMAZING!!!!!! I BLEW up about 50 balloons for an Easter balloon Arch we didn't even need but hey why not...lol you can blow up like 25 balloons in the time it takes to manually blow up 5 and no dizziness it headache! Just bought 350 balloons for my daughters party and guess what.... They're all getting blown up since I have this machine lol , best unnecessary purchase I've ever made!!!!! PS it's not TOO loud. It's bareable.
customer_reviews.author: Sara W.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and works
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to use. My 7 year old was able to help me do a arc. Knocked it out in less than 2 hours.
customer_reviews.author: Irene

customer_reviews.title: Defective automatic switch
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 2 pumps in 1 order. Both pressure switches that toggle the air on and off were defective meaning that each time I want to fill a balloon I have to turn the power on/off by flipping the manual switch. I have made 4 attempts to communicate with ChanBasics to submit a warranty claim for over a month. I've been given the runaround to this day. I will update with a thorough review once they've completed the warranty process.
customer_reviews.author: Euri

customer_reviews.title: Worked great and saved A LOT of breath
customer_reviews.text: Worked great and saved A LOT of breath! I used for about 25 balloons and it did great. I did not realize when I bought it that the blue nozzle only runs when you push down on it which is a great feature so you don't have to leave the whole thing running while blowing and tying balloons. If you flip the on switch the pink one runs continuously too if that is what you want.
customer_reviews.author: Courtnee

customer_reviews.title: Worked well for 45 days then wouldn't turn off
customer_reviews.text: This product worked great! I was about to do 2 different ballon garland. I was just currently using the machine to blow up balloon for an event I am doing tomorrow 9/8. Now the machine won't shut off I can't use it and I have about 100 balloon I still need to blow up. I purchase this item July 27th so I've had it about 45 days used only 3 times and already can no longer use the product. I hope the seller see this and contacts me
customer_reviews.author: Cecilia Charles

customer_reviews.title: Compact electric balloon pump. Bright fun color and makes tons of balloons in a snap for parties.
customer_reviews.text: Received our electric balloon pump this evening. We unpackaged it and tested it with a bag of value balloons that are made for helium or regular blow up and everything went well. I attached a little video so you can see how well the pump works. I am really looking forward to using it for our son’s birthday coming up. My only recommendation is to fix the door that stores the cord. It was extremely hard to open. Overall, the pump will definitely make life easier for parties and we are happy with our purchase. I will update if anything changes.
customer_reviews.author: SCMoose

customer_reviews.title: Fills balloons very quickly
customer_reviews.text: I used this to make a balloon arch. The first time I made an arch, it took about 3 hours between three of us. It took me about an hour and a half by myself to complete the arch using this. It fills balloons in about 2 seconds. I can’t imagine planning parties without this anymore. It can inflate one balloon at a time or two balloons if you have another person helping. I like that it plugs in so I don’t have to worry about replacing batteries. The pump comes with a compartment for the power cord to store it. Overall, great product.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: 1st birthday
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to blow up balloons for my daughters first birthday. Upon opening the box I liked how compact the machine was. However after flipping the switch to on, it was extremely loud, and scared my daughter so much that we didn’t do the balloons. For this reason I am giving 3 stars, for $20 I would like the noise level to be less. For the record it does it’s job which is blow up balloons and it does it fast so fast that the balloon almost pops in your face so be careful!
customer_reviews.author: Katherine

customer_reviews.title: This thing is super strong and super quick
customer_reviews.text: Oh my gosh! This thing is super strong and super quick. I had every intention of blowing up 100 balloons for my son's baby shower (held this past Saturday) and the pump was awesome! Unfortunately, the balloons I purchased were not so good; they popped shortly after. Luckily, I had purchased a few balloons from Wal-Mart earlier and those balloons worked out great; so much better than the ones I purchased here on Amazon. And my granddaughters loved the pump so much! We had a blast! Thank you Seller!
customer_reviews.author: N Manley

customer_reviews.title: Air for balloon but not helium
customer_reviews.text: I was lookin for a helium tank but i guess i got excited when i saw how little and convenient this machine was, i got this instead. So it only blows air into balloons so ur balloons wont flow like they do when filled w helium. However we compromised by laying all the balloons on the floor and the party decor pack came with stickies to stick the balloons onto walls or onto eachother so it worked out fine! The machine IS noisy though so be prepared for that! Other than that its great especially for parties, u can bring it anywhere and just plug it into an outlet!
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Great for Blowing Up A LOT of Balloons
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of these to blow up 1000 balloons for a New Years Eve balloon drop. This is such a time-saving, and potentially life-saving, device. We could have passed out trying to blow up that many balloons ourselves, but the boss demanded 1000, so I jumped on Amazon and found these. My boss will probably not be happy when he sees I charged them to my company credit card as they were not ‘necessary’ but I will fight that battle when it comes. We did get those 1000 balloons blown up easlily with these and no one died, so I’m going to say that is a win.
customer_reviews.author: Lady A

customer_reviews.title: I had a really nice one that I paid over a hundred dollars for
customer_reviews.text: I had a really nice one that I paid over a hundred dollars for, and so far this has been just as good and so light weight and compact I love it for medium jobs. I'm thinking of getting another one so that I can have two.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fast and Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I used this product for the first time to blow up balloons for a tower. I was happy with the speed of the air, but hoped for a more consistent size meter. There ard no gauges for size and the air comes out at one speed. I had to “eyeball” each balloon to get them to be the same size. It was hard to do. I also wish it came in gray or black. Hot pink products look suspicious when adults are using them. 😉. I have changed my review to give this product two stars because one of the air releases broke. Now I have to turn on and off the machine to get it to work.
customer_reviews.author: sk94

customer_reviews.title: Broke too soon
customer_reviews.text: Used only twice before it broke. Used first time for my daughter's birthday, it worked nicely. Used it again over July 4th weekend. The unit stopped working. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: mm

customer_reviews.title: Great product, should have bought one sooner
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I wished we would have bought one of these sooner! We recently bought one to blow up a balloon arch for our daughter's birthday and this pump made quick work of it. We regularly blow up balloons around the house as well for our kids to play with, so this will be so great to have going forward. As it is a little noisy (I think to be expected), we loved the feature that you could push down on the nozzle as needed without turning the switch on / off and two people could blow up balloons at a time. This makes the job fast! Very satisfied with the purchase
customer_reviews.author: Justin Headley

customer_reviews.title: Fine for adults. Be cautious with children!
customer_reviews.text: Beware My 9 yr old granddaughter used it with me. It did not work well on smaller top balloons. On other balloons it filled up so quickly, in a second. I had my child put on glasses to operate for it's a real possibility if you dont remove it in a second, the balloon could easily burst and a piece fly in the child's eye. Constant adult supervision required. For adult use, it is very quick and efficient, however, does not blow up certain balloons well at all. The ones long and thin wants work.
customer_reviews.author: Maryann

customer_reviews.title: Wish I knew this was a thing earlier
customer_reviews.text: Lots of kids in my life, sooooo many balloons. We love to make arches, garlands etc out of balloons. I looked at this once we were planning an especially large party. It was the first time I considered this, or tie off clips, etc. We needed several hundred balloons made, and I ordered this to help out. It did a great job and I recommend it if you have a large project or even if you, like me, will be making several parties worth of balloons. It also blows up air mattresses, pool toys, etc. I hope it lasts a long time, because I will need it to!
customer_reviews.author: Cindy B.

customer_reviews.title: Fun!
customer_reviews.text: Really fun and easy to use to use! The down side is how loud it is when in use, which unavoidable. Can’t wait for a more modern inflator to be created and produce a low hum when in use. I really like the different shapes nozzles available, as well as the two settings for use. One setting allows it to inflate at a constant rate, the other settings allows it to inflate when pressing on one of the nozzles. I really like the way you can store the cord in the inflator itself for easy storage, and all pieces stay intact.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine

customer_reviews.title: Good Product but very Loud
customer_reviews.text: This machine is extremely loud. If you have an infant, they will get shocked and even start crying. It wakes them even when they are sleeping. Had to operate the product in the patio to avoid my little one. Also, unless you have an extra help, the 2nd nozzle cannot be used by 1 person. The balloons get inflated quickly and will need to remove it to avoid bursting; and hence will need your 2nd hand to tie the mouth of the balloon. Overall the product works fine. Does require a bit of getting used to (you may end up bursting a few balloons.)
customer_reviews.author: Abhishek P

customer_reviews.title: Low Pressure
customer_reviews.text: This does not work to pump up twisty balloons. It is super loud and sounds like a vacuum cleaner thus I believe it is a centrifugal pump and does not develop enough pressure to inflate the twisty balloons. It is high volume though and will very quickly inflate regular balloons- and pop them if you’re not careful. I think twisty balloons require some sort of positive displacement (piston) pump - high pressure / low volume which I could not find here. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Mauricemk

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I love this it makes blowing up balloons simple quick and easy. If you are a decorator and do balloon displays this is the product for you light weight compact and easy to use. I have been telling everyone I know to get one even if it just for something fun like blowing up balloons for the kids this is a must have.
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine

customer_reviews.title: Works very quickly and efficiently
customer_reviews.text: This thing is amazing! I was decorating for the pinewood derby and blew up (and tied) 40 balloons in about 5 minutes. My kids have been loving using it too. I also used it to blow up 4 tire pool tubes and it was much more convenient than getting out the air compressor. Just wish it had a little thinner attachment for that purpose. I had to squeeze the nozzle on the tube and hold it on top of the attachment the entire time but that’s not what it was made for anyway so it’s not the manufacturers fault for not thinking of that.
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: Fast and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This thing inflates balloons fast! It saved me a ton of time over a manual inflator, without this the archway I built would have taken me all day. One of the two air nozzles acts as a button to start the air which is really convenient. The only thing I'd like that this didn't have is an adjustment to optionally slow the flow rate down, but at this price point I couldn't see them adding it. It's a little loud, but that's to be expected.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Saves time and energy
customer_reviews.text: Used it to blow up over 100 balloons to create an arch. Took less than a hour to blow up the balloons and another hour or less to put the arch together. Way easier than blowing it up yourself and less expensive than renting a helium tank. Don’t decorate often but you can’t beat the ease and convenience it brings. Worth buying!
customer_reviews.author: SM

customer_reviews.title: Loud & no pressure control
customer_reviews.text: At first i like the idea of using the machine for upcoming b'day party. I needed to blow 300-350 balloons for decoration. I was excited to use the machine but ended up returning the product. Cons: You can't control the speed due to which i wasted more than 50 balloons. Pressure is too high, be caution. Stop button didn't work it sounds loud. i mean it.
customer_reviews.author: S. Batra

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING!
customer_reviews.text: This pump exceeded my expectations!! My husband and daughter were able to blow up balloons at the same time! It's fast, so you may burst a few balloons before you get the hang of it. Initially we needed to keep letting air out because it blows air very quickly, but after a few minutes we got the hang of it. We blew up all the balloons in the two garlands in the picture, plus extras we didn't use in less than an hour. (that includes our breaks in between). If you have any ambitious balloon projects this pump is the way to go.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: The best $20 I ever spent
customer_reviews.text: This is the best $20 I ever spent. I had to build a balloon arch for a company event, and I knew these lungs were not going to make it the old fashioned way, not even with help. So I took a chance and bought this little gem. So easy and fast. If only building the arch was as easy as blowing up 300 balloons. We were able to blow up about 150 in twenty or thirty minutes. Without this machine, I'd still be at the office at 9 pm blowing up balloons.
customer_reviews.author: J. Belinda Yandell

customer_reviews.title: Great Investment
customer_reviews.text: This was a great investment! After using it for my cousins sweet 16 I was planning to return it, but decided to keep it for future events. It cut our time by half to make a balloon garland. I can’t wait to create more things with balloons thanks to this great machine. Totally worth the money especially if you throw lots of parties & decorate. Balloons add that extra touch 🙂
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Time Saver!!
customer_reviews.text: LIFE SAVER!!! Why didn’t I get one sooner!??? I really like to make balloon towers for my families birthday parties and normally it would take me a few hours to blow them all up by mouth. This machine cut my time down to 15 minutes !!! I will never not use this again!! Also it’s pretty awesome that there’s a compartment to hold the electrical cord inside and out of the way when not in use. Great design whoever thought of this!! Love it! Absolutely recommend!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: AngelaTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Completely useless to me
customer_reviews.text: Bought two pumps, opened the side compartment where the plug us, and both pumps have non-American plugs. Completely useless to me!
customer_reviews.author: shelli

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth the price
customer_reviews.text: It can be very loud, but it blows your balloons up very fast, takes some getting used to if you've never used one before, it only does air, not helium! Has a space to put the cord, it has amazing power so beware, your balloons may pop before you know it!
customer_reviews.author: Neerhs Aihpos

customer_reviews.title: Best thing ever
customer_reviews.text: Best thing ever. We had to blow up a bunch of balloons and this machine really saved on my cheeks. My daughter loved helping to blow them up while I tied them. Now, if I could only find a better way to tie them to save on my fingers...lol:)
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does not work, make extreme amount of noise
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to help inflate more than 500 balloons but this makes horrible loud noise. I know they are supposed to make noise but this one was extremely noisy. It was no help had to inflate 500 balloons with my old one that makes less than half the noise. It would stop working after 2 or 3 balloons. Sorry had to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: This really does the trick if you have a lot of balloons to fill up. It's quick and and easy to use. A little noise which is expected - but we used it in our small condo with toddler sleeping in the next room over and it didn't wake her up. It heats up a little but didn't disrupt what we were doing. Totally worth the price and it's a keeper for our next balloon decor fest. :)
customer_reviews.author: dkla

customer_reviews.title: saves lungs!
customer_reviews.text: we decorate with a lot of balloons at work and used to use helium but those don't last long. Instead, I purchased long balloon sticks and use air! blowing them up manually was not an option so this little purchase was great. Very compact, works like it says. Pretty loud though, so we have to use it in the back room. Would like a less obnoxious color scheme- like black lol. The colors make it look like a cheap toy. The noise and color are really the only reasons i didn't give it a 5
customer_reviews.author: HoneyK

customer_reviews.title: Seriously, buy this!
customer_reviews.text: If you have more than 5 balloons to blow up...save your breath and get this!!! Its SO easy to use and will save you a ton of time and breath. I have asthma so blowing up balloons is hard for me anyway. Hand pumps are hard to manage. This thing is a SNAP! I wish it could tie the knot for you too! Then we'd need a 6 star rating system. This thing blows and doesn't suck.
customer_reviews.author: Scott B.

customer_reviews.title: I love love love this electric balloon blower!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love love love this electric balloon blower!!! I normally hate blowing up balloons (just too much work to do by mouth) and I couldn't resist this blower as the price was so good for the value. Helium balloons get so expensive, but once you buy this blower it's basically "free air" (it plugs in -- it is NOT battery operated). I used it to inflate both mylar & latex balloons & I even got inspired & made my first balloon sculpture (a 7 foot tall palm tree). Blowing the balloons was a breeze (pardon the pun!). I really enjoyed using this machine & look forward to making more balloon sculptures in the future!
customer_reviews.author: Kat M

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: After using for a birthday party, the automatic is not working anymore. It stopped working so we're only using the manual switch on and off. Cheap.
customer_reviews.author: She

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Use
customer_reviews.text: Amazing and so easy to use. Got it to make a balloon garland for my cousin’s baby shower I had never made a ballon garland before so I was a little nervous. This thing was so easy to use and made easy work of blowing up 100 balloons. If you’re worried about spending the money don’t. It’s easily worth the $20 for the time you’re saving (and misery of blowing up balloons with your mouth!).
customer_reviews.author: Sarah L

customer_reviews.title: Literally, the best thing ever!! 🙌🏽
customer_reviews.text: I don’t think you understand how happy I am with this machine 😂 lol I literally just blow up balloons so I have a reason to use this lol I made this awesome balloon garland with the help of this machine. Also, I blew up these 40” Oh Baby balloons. The different size nozzles are really helpful. I like that you can have a continuos airflow or just a push down when you need to blow the balloons up. I am beyond happy I bought this! Also, I saw a review of the plug not fitting in the normal US plugins. But mine was, and worked perfectly. :)
customer_reviews.author: Brianna

customer_reviews.title: Super strong
customer_reviews.text: I highly recommend this product for those who are tired of using hand pumps or your own breath to blow up balloons! This blower blew up my 12' balloons to it's max in less than 3 seconds! You can use either small 9' balloons or anything bigger and this baby will do its job! Leave it in off mode and the blue nozzle (sensor) will still blow the balloons when touched! Saves a BUNCH of time and honestly, SO WORTH THE MONEY. Saved me time and prevents pain and suffering! (lmao)
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Thai

customer_reviews.title: Don't even hesitate a second...it's worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Best investment of money & time! Had a graduation party to decorate for...included a total of 600 balloons (several balloon garlands (each 9ft -15ft long). It turned out absolutely stunning. The idea would simply NOT have been executed....period...without the balloon pump. It was so quick...easy. We made an assembly line...and the job went so quick it was a bit shocking!!! The pump has been used for 2 more parties since then >>> much smaller projects (haha) my point is....the machine makes things so quick and easy...that you might find yourself thinking "this event needs...ummmm....balloons...yes balloons"...lol...because of the handy dandy machine!!!! ***As a side note....invest in quality balloons...I may have had 2 balloons pop out of hundreds***
customer_reviews.author: BW

customer_reviews.title: Very powerful, works quickly
customer_reviews.text: it's very small and lightweight. This machine is also very powerful and loud. Gave me a heart attack when I first used it. You have to be careful with small balloons as you can easily overinflate them. This is going to save my lungs when I decorate for the next party. Glad I bought it. This is a time saver and it opens up a lot of decorating options. I recommend this machine. Idk if this machine is durable yet as I just walked in the house with it, but it feels as if it's made of good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Short and Shapely

customer_reviews.title: Love this machine!
customer_reviews.text: I can tell you I love this thing 1 million times but you have to buy it to learn how easy it is to use. I’ve been making balloon arches since grade school and this is going to make every birthday, graduation, retirement whatever the heck party want more amazing and special. So easy to use yeah it’s kind of loud but what do you expect it’s basically an air pump
customer_reviews.author: Cupcake | Marrisa Manuel

customer_reviews.title: It has changed my life
customer_reviews.text: I used this for my sisters anniversary party and it worked incredibly! I made a whole balloon arch and extra balloons to put around the house. This little machine has changed my life! It has a power source so you plug it in the wall and it has two spouts to inflate the balloons. It fills the balloon very fast, so please be careful or you’ll be popping your balloons.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie N.

customer_reviews.title: Essential purchase for a balloon garland!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a balloon garland kit elsewhere on Amazon for my daughter's birthday party, and I'm glad I took the advice of other reviewers and bought this pump as well. It works perfectly and quickly inflated both large and extra large balloons. It sounds like a vacuum cleaner and is about that loud, too. I'm glad to have this on hand for future decorations and inflatable toys.
customer_reviews.author: VeraZ

customer_reviews.title: issues
customer_reviews.text: This is great if you are only blowing up 12" round balloons! DO NOT BUY IF YOU ARE PLANNING ON USING THIS FOR LONG BALLOONS (LIKE THE ONES FOR BALLOON ANIMALS) IT DOESN'T WORK FOR THEM. Also gets pretty hot.
customer_reviews.author: jaime farley

customer_reviews.title: Great item for a good price!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a my niece's first Birthday party, blew up over 150 balloons, including making 2 balloon arches. What normally would have taken me 2-3 hours with a hand pump, took less than an hour (including assembly of arches) and was so much easier on myself! The controls are easy to use, you switch it on and it only triggers air when you attach a balloon and press down on the right side nozzle, super simple!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Price

customer_reviews.title: love this machine
customer_reviews.text: if you decorate for parties etc you will love this. Balloons look so nice for birthday, showers, etc this makes the decorating part of the party sooo quick. we blew so many balloons sooo quick for all our decorations and it made the job so easy and quick. In no time we had so many balloons I mean in less the 15 minutes we had enough balloons blown up for a waterfall balloon decoration. I love this little machine
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: save your breath. Buy this!
customer_reviews.text: i attempted to do a balloon arch years ago and i blew the balloons myself. As you can imagine it took forever and i was exhausted. This year i bought this and attempted to make another arch. This little machine made all the difference, balloons were blown super quick and with little effort. Love this machine!
customer_reviews.author: Juju221

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for large balloons
customer_reviews.text: I bought thirty-two 36 inch balloons to decorate my house for my son's college graduation. It was the only celebration we were having because of COVID. I planned to blow these giant balloons up by mouth. I made an attempt and thought, "What the heck? I'll never get through these. I'm oxygen deprived after two breaths!" My husband went on line and ordered this little machine. It worked great.
customer_reviews.author: Marcia

customer_reviews.title: Quickly blows up balloons
customer_reviews.text: This inflator does exactly what it's supposed to - it blows up balloons quickly and easily. Some balloons (the longer, skinnier variety) should be pre-stretched, but that is true whether you use a machine to blow it up or your own lungs. If you are inflating any number of balloons this inflator will save you a good deal of time and effort. It's pretty easy to control the size of the balloons once you get the hang of it. The blower is pretty loud when it fires up and both nozzles will blow air regardless of whether you are using the automatic nozzle or the switch operation.
customer_reviews.author: SgtLex

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this YEARS ago bec we go BIG on bdays in our fam. I was SO tired of blowing up balloons via hand pump and needed help. This pink pump is soooo amazing. You get several attachments and the power cord ensures that your prep work will be cut in half. 4 years and many uses later...it’s still my fave bday party assistant.
customer_reviews.author: JMama18

customer_reviews.title: Lifesaver
customer_reviews.text: Needed to blow up a bunch of balloons for a party and didn’t want to use the hand pump since after a while it can get tiring. Also needed to blow up giant balloons and a hand pump wasn’t going to cut it. Worked fast and amazingly easy. Save yourself the trouble of blowing balloons up and get this it’s seriously a time and life saver.
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Little spendy, but works great
customer_reviews.text: I really like this item, but I do think it's overpriced. It is made of very cheap plastic so I am hoping it lasts. It's not like one has to blow up balloons everyday. It was extremely helpful to use it to blow up a ton of balloons fast. 100% satisfied for that use. Two people can blow up at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: An Awesome Machine!
customer_reviews.text: What A Machine! I love Amazon. This machine is worth every penny. This machine is absolutely amazing!!! I am 110% satisfied with this gaget. It supercedes my expectations. I love the dual operating system. It comes with a power cord or you can use batteries. It has an on/off switch so that it can be turned off at any time and it stops instantly. Get ready to have a balloon blowing up party. It is on the loud side but who cares. It gets the job done quickly and save lots of time. I'm so happy I made the right choice by chosing this machine instead of a more costly one. Love it!!! Thanks IDAODAN. You got it right.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Bell

customer_reviews.title: Inflate in no time
customer_reviews.text: This was the first time I used a product like this. I have been using manual pump. The inflation time is very quick. Options of auto helps but I prefer manual to make sure the balloon can be taken out before it is full enough to burst. Only two things that I think would have impressed me more is the size could have been compact or smaller and less noisy. Not that it’s huge or too noisy but smaller size and less noisy could have made it more impressive. I loved the product. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Rahul

customer_reviews.title: Birthday party must haves!
customer_reviews.text: Where has this been my whole life?! This is a MUST have for balloons. No headache or dizziness from blowing up balloons by mouth. I feel like I’ve discovered some kind of witchcraft, for which I’m forever grateful! Sped through 50ish balloons in about 5 mins. Also good for drying nail polish lol. Perfection.
customer_reviews.author: C. Skrobak

customer_reviews.title: Time saver for parties
customer_reviews.text: Works very well. One important thing to note: it’s very noisy. The key to managing the noise level is to set the on/off switch to “o” and use the nozzle on the right bottom corner that includes the words “push switch” to fill your balloon. This way it only makes noise while you are filling the balloon. Also, the two blue nozzles positioned on the right back corner of the machine can be removed and screwed onto the bigger nozzles that provide the inflation. Makes it much easier to fill smaller balloons. I’m very satisfied with my purchase! Great way to save time blowing up balloons and saves you from straining your lungs to blow up manually!
customer_reviews.author: ACMichigan

customer_reviews.title: Works great but flimsy
customer_reviews.text: This works really well but you get what you pay for. I’ve only used it twice. While using it the second time after blowing up my first balloon, it fell from a low area and low impact. I then heard a piece inside that was freely moving. When attempting to continue use, it started smelling like it was burning and making louder sounds.
customer_reviews.author: Candice

customer_reviews.title: Time is money & this is cheap AND saves you tons of time!
customer_reviews.text: You could blow 80 balloons up WITH YOUR MOUTH like some kind of mouth-breather. OR you could drop $20 & save yourself 371 hours AND your lips won't smell like latex. This sturdy little workhorse is worth three times the price. Sure you could drag out the air compressor, but this is pink & weighs 100 pounds less!
customer_reviews.author: Eryn

customer_reviews.title: Efficient and fast balloon blowing
customer_reviews.text: We blew up 300 balloons in 30 min or less! It was such an awesome change from panting after manually blowing up 2 balloons. This is such a great little machine I plan to keep for every party. It’s also good that it doesn’t use helium bc there’s a shortage and we all need to get used to balloons that don’t float.
customer_reviews.author: Birdie NYCTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Little powerful machine
customer_reviews.text: Worth the money; I wish I had this when my kids were going up. Pros: Super fast and very easy to use. No assembly required other than taking the cord out and plugging it in. Con: Somewhat loud I highly recommend purchasing this little powerful machine.
customer_reviews.author: LaBurgess

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to use! Plug it in & get to work. I ordered this specifically bc I wanted to make balloon columns for the first time. I knew it would take a lot of balloons & I wasn't going to blow them up myself. This pump allowed 2 of us to inflate 2 balloons at a time. From start to finish, it took one hour to inflate & assemble these columns. This pump saved us so much time!
customer_reviews.author: georgiadiva2k

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase I made!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product! Made my party prep time cut in half! Very easy to use, light in weight and portable. Shipper delivered it almost a week BEFORE it was scheduled to arrive. I wish this came with attachments to blow up pool floats and bike tires!! I would purchase from this seller again.
customer_reviews.author: LA

customer_reviews.title: You need this...
customer_reviews.text: ...to blow up balloons no matter their size. You will love it, I promise. So easy to use and so quick to blow up a balloon or 50. I have used it about 6 times now for different events of 50 to 100 balloons all sizes and it is outstanding. HIGHLY RECOMMENDED.
customer_reviews.author: jaguar

customer_reviews.title: Very Easy to Use!
customer_reviews.text: I used this pump to make my first organic balloon garland and it worked perfectly! I have a event decor business so I ordered two. Great value and very easy to use!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Record-warren

customer_reviews.title: The only way to blow up balloons
customer_reviews.text: How did I even attempt to blow up balloons before I had this thing. I can produce a decent sized balloon garland in no time now. So fast and easy. It makes me want to use balloons to decorate everything now. There really is no other way to pump balloons. Save your energy and just get an electric pump. I got my moneys worth out of it after the first garland use!
customer_reviews.author: MyLSD

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product!
customer_reviews.text: I use this for all my balloon garlands for my event company and it does an amazing job. I will end up having to buy another soon bc we are so busy, but it is a great product. There are 2 pumps you can use. 4 would have been great, but there are other products if you need something with that much force.
customer_reviews.author: Daniela S.

customer_reviews.title: Lifesaver
customer_reviews.text: This is a purchase that will continue to be used for lots of parties to come. Excellent purchase. Take a little bit of practice to get used to at first. Very powerful, so wouldn't let little kids attempt to use this product. Has multiple tips and has either pulse or continuous settings, so you can use it for regular latex and foil balloons. Very happy we saw this and purchased it. Certainly saved our lungs!!
customer_reviews.author: michele

customer_reviews.title: SO EASY
customer_reviews.text: So much easier and faster to blow up all the balloons! I'm always decorating and balloons always make for a party environment! This is so easy, and fast to use! Was able to blow up over a hundred balloons in just a few minutes! It's a little loud so I wouldn't recommend if you're trying to do something in secret or quietly but that was expected. Best purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: MUST HAVE
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting it to be bigger. Did not realize it was That small, BUT it works really good, I am happy with the purchase, I hesitate for months before ordering it but after I got it, I realized I needed to order it sooner. Really easy to use, my 4yr old son is able to inflate balloons by himself, it’s that easy to use it. Did not over heather on me like other people here said. I really really recommended It saved my kid’s birthday party
customer_reviews.author: Mari Mireles

customer_reviews.title: Time Saver! Definitely worth the purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in hopes it would lessen the time it took to blow up balloons that I had bought to make a balloon garland. And it did!! It’s a small machine so really read the directions because it can overheat. But my husband and I blew up two balloon garland kits for my graduation party with this electric pump and we are so happy with our purchase! I purchased this because my sister in law had bought one for her baby shower in which she had a balloon garland we had to blow up and so I decided to buy one for us to have too!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica.

customer_reviews.title: Time saver and reliable!
customer_reviews.text: Totally worth the money! My mom and I did my nephews ballon arc and it was so QUICK AND EFFICIENT! I couldn’t imagine myself blowing up so many balloons and this machine can blow two balloons at once! Highly needed and recommend if you need to decorate with a lot of balloons! It’s so helpful!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: It’s Broken
customer_reviews.text: It broke!!!!!! The switch for the machine doesn’t work properly! I can’t turn it on and off. Once I plug it to the outlet both pumps work and air comes out , when I try to switch it off to use only one air pump it continues to send air out in both holes ! I have to unplug it from the outlet for it to stop. Super inconvenient !
customer_reviews.author: Jules

customer_reviews.title: Fast and efficient
customer_reviews.text: If you have ever blown up balloons with your mouth, you will appreciate this quick and efficient way of blowing balloons. It is so fast and your cheeks won't hurt! AS you gain experience, you know how big you can blow-up the balloons. Kind of easy to over-blow them.
customer_reviews.author: A. LaCorte

customer_reviews.title: Makes building a column a breeze!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! This little balloon blower was a time saver in making balloon columns for our celebration. Using 11" balloons, we had them all blew up in less than a half hour for these two columns. This inflator was the best purchase ever and I will be able to use it in the future for other parties and graduation! I wish I would have bought it when my son was younger as balloons add a special celebration touch! Machine works well and does the job! Easy to store away. A must buy.
customer_reviews.author: diygal

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Great balloon blower, easy to use. I didn’t realize that one of the 2 blower nozzles was not a push nozzle, meaning it was either always off or always on. This made it nearly impossible for me to blow up 2 balloons at once by myself, hence one star knocked off. Otherwise, no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Marsha Stone

customer_reviews.title: Great product, would recommend
customer_reviews.text: I like how small this is, the cord fits nicely inside and a latched door secures the cord for safe keeping. You can inflate 2 at a time if you're more talented than I am. On off switch: its great that you can have it on for continuous use or only when inflating. light weight, and not terribly loud
customer_reviews.author: Addicted2Amazon

customer_reviews.title: A must have for party decor
customer_reviews.text: This is a absolutely must have for any party decorations. It such a big help when blowing up balloon. It saves you so much time and helps you create with much more ease any balloon decoration. Really durable and such a great price for it. I am so happy with it
customer_reviews.author: KARINA

customer_reviews.title: Makes it soooo much easier
customer_reviews.text: We have put this little electric balloon pump to good use on a couple occasions now - making a balloon arch for a shower (200 balloons), and for balloon animals and balloon hats during a family reunion. It's fast and easy to use, good purchase!
customer_reviews.author: K.B.

customer_reviews.title: Must buy, no more
customer_reviews.text: If you still blow balloons by mouth, like we used to, stop, add this to your cart and buy now!!! I’ve had this item in my cart for awhile and barely ordered it before my New Year’s Eve bash. This came around 5 on NYE so we we’re already done decorating. I decided to just blow up one balloon before I put it away. Let me just say that, that one balloon led to an entire balloon drop of at least 30 balloons. LOL!! This tiny machine is worth the money and many balloon decorating. I’m so excited to blow up balloons just for fun now.
customer_reviews.author: corina

customer_reviews.title: A must have for balloon garland!
customer_reviews.text: This was a valuable part of my daughters Sweet Sixteen party setup. The balloons were filled so quickly, my oldest daughter and I filled over 100 balloons in a snap. It was very very loud, but easy to use so it was worth the noise
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Handy!
customer_reviews.text: Love it. It saved so much time when I was doing 2 balloon columns and a balloon arch. But you have to be careful to make sure that they don't pop, because this machine blows the air in them really fast. And try to give it a few minutes break because after continuous usage it does get a little warm.
customer_reviews.author: ShoeLover2000

customer_reviews.title: Best invention ever
customer_reviews.text: This is the best invention anyone could have created. We throw a bunch of parties for our four boys and we always get stuck blowing up balloons. Not only does it save us our own air but they blow up fast. Worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Victory78

customer_reviews.title: Very handy device for if you need alot of balloons fast.
customer_reviews.text: we needed to inflate hundreds of balloons the morning of a party and this little guy did the job. The auto on switch on one nozzle allowed you to inflate balloons as fast as you could put them on. Works best with better quality, thicker balloons and you may want to put some type of light lubricant on it to aid in slipping the balloon on the nozzle.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Craig

customer_reviews.title: Great machine, fast shipping
customer_reviews.text: This is totally awesome, bought it for work, I'm in retail and we blow up balloons hundreds for every major sale, company provides hand pump...No way!!! I got this and within seconds I've got a full balloon. I find using one nozzle easier, I'm not skilled enough or have cat like reflexes to do two without the other side shooting off...lol Don't buy the one nozzle balloons take longer and this isn't much more
customer_reviews.author: John H.

customer_reviews.title: Burns up quick
customer_reviews.text: I operate a balloon business. well I purchased 1 for a small job of a 10 ft arch 4- 8 ft columns, Burned up after 123 balloons. First it got real Hot like it was going to catch fire, that was at about 80 or so balloons. Will I buy again? LOL!! NO!!
customer_reviews.author: michael

product_meta.title: IDAODAN Portable Dual Nozzle Rose Red 110V 600W Electric Balloon Blower Pump/Electric Balloon Inflator For Decoration
feature_bullets: Light Weight and Portable design. Easily create a warm atmosphere.This balloon inflator commonly used in some activities/festive/party/celebration/decoration.
Size: 20 x 15 x 13 (cm). Type: manual, automatic one. Pressure: 18000pa-22000pa, 1.75psi. Input voltage :110-120V. Frequency: 50/60Hz.
Product weight: 1.3KG. Color:Rose red. Air volume 750 (L/min). Power: 600W. Package Include: 1 x Balloon Air Pump, 1 x User Manual
This electric balloon pump fit to latex balloon and decorative balloon. Double pump, balloon air pump. Balloon pump has two modes: manually and automatically.
SAFETY & WARRANTY: ETL approved; 1-year warranty and lifetime support provided by iDaodan.
